mapper.select: select t.user_id, t.user_name, t.pwd, t.pay_pwd, t.real_name, t.email, t.mobile_phone, t1.role_id from user t left join user_role t1 on t.user_id=t1.user_id where t.mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t.user_id, t.user_name, t.pwd, t.pay_pwd, t.real_name, t.email, t.mobile_phone, t.add_time, t.last_update_dtime, t3.id_no, t3.type_id FROM user t LEFT JOIN user_identify t3 ON t.user_id=t3.user_id WHERE t.mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t.user_id AS userId, t.mobile_phone AS mobilePhone, t.real_name AS realName, t1.type_id AS typeId, t1.id_no AS idNo FROM `user` t LEFT JOIN user_identify t1 ON t.user_id = t1.user_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t.hospital_name AS hospitalName, t.hospital_level AS hospitalLevel, t.dept_name AS deptName, t2.doctor_name AS doctorName, t2.doctor_code AS doctorCode, t2.doctor_intro AS doctorIntro, t2.positional AS positional, t3.user_id AS userId FROM hospital_dept t LEFT JOIN hospital_register_doctor t2 ON t.dept_id = t2.dept_id INNER JOIN user_doctor t3 ON t2.doctor_code = t3.doctor_code WHERE t3.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY hospital_id ORDER BY hospital_id DESC
